cold_beef_carpaccio.name: Beef Carpaccio
cold_beef_carpaccio.short: Thinly sliced beef with arugula and parmesan.
cold_beef_carpaccio.description: Tender, thinly sliced beef served with fresh arugula, parmesan and a light lemon–olive oil dressing. A refined and aromatic Italian classic.

cold_salmon_tartar.name: Salmon Tartare
cold_salmon_tartar.short: Fresh salmon tartare with dill and lime.
cold_salmon_tartar.description: Fine tartare made from fresh salmon, seasoned with dill, capers and lime. Light, elegant and perfect as a starter.

cold_bruschetta.name: Bruschetta
cold_bruschetta.short: Toasted bread with tomatoes and basil.
cold_bruschetta.description: Crispy toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil and high-quality olive oil. A vibrant Mediterranean appetizer.

cold_cheese_plate.name: Cheese Plate
cold_cheese_plate.short: Selection of regional cheeses with grapes and nuts.
cold_cheese_plate.description: A fine selection of regional cheeses, served with fresh grapes and nuts. Ideal with a glass of wine or as a light starter.

cold_hummus.name: Hummus
cold_hummus.short: Chickpea cream with sesame and herbs.
cold_hummus.description: Smooth chickpea cream refined with sesame, olive oil and herbs. Vegan, aromatic and gently seasoned.

cold_olives.name: Marinated Olives
cold_olives.description: Carefully marinated olives prepared with a blend of Mediterranean herbs. A simple and flavorful appetizer.
